text: Sanmenxia railway station () is a station on Longhai railway in Hubin District, Sanmenxia, Henan. == History == The station was established in 1927. == See also == * Sanmenxia West railway station * Sanmenxia South railway station, a high-speed railway station on Zhengzhou–Xi'an High-Speed Railway ==References== Category:Railway stations in Henan Category:Stations on the Longhai Railway Category:Railway stations in China opened in 1927
title: Sanmenxia railway station
